descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: With the game coming to a close, Paul George tries to swipe the ball from Marcus Morris and the two get into a scuffle, resulting in both benches rushing the court.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Game over doesn’t stop Pacers, Pistons from scuffling ) 2016/01/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: Game over doesn't stop Pacers, Pistons from scuffling
